# Log and journal files
*.jou
*.log
*.str
*.dmp
*.rpt
*.xml

# Checkpoints and design runs
*.wdb
*.pb
*.xsa
*.xpr
*.runs/
*.cache/
*.hw/
*.sim/
*.ip_user_files/
*.Xil/

# IP-related
*.data/
*.srcs/
*.sdk/
*.ip/
*.iop/
*.cxl.ip/

# Backup / Autosave
*.backup*
*~ 

# OS-specific
.DS_Store
Thumbs.db
